greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: T(n,k) = binomial(n - k - 1, k), 0 <= k < n, and T(n,n) = (-1)^n, triangle read by rows.
comment: The n-th row consists of the coefficients in the expansion of (-x)^n + (((1 + sqrt(1 + 4*x))/2)^n -((1 - sqrt(1 + 4*x))/2)^n )/sqrt(1 + 4*x).
The coefficients in the expansion of Sum_{j=0..floor((n - 1)/2)} T(n,k)*x^(n - 2*j - 1) yield the n-th row in A168561, the coefficients of the n-th Fibonacci polynomial.
Row n sums up to Fibonacci(n) + (-1)^n (A008346).
program: (Maxima) create_list(binomial(n - k - 1, k), n, 0, 12, k, 0, n);
results.author: _Franck Maminirina Ramaharo_, Oct 14 2018
